identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a luxury chauffeur experience that feels like a 5-star hotel concierge, not a generic car rental site.
principles: Fusion: Hotel Hospitality x Automotive Precision
Content: Every pixel must justify the premium price tag

headings.usage: All H1, H2, H3. Use for emotional impact.

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use Primary Light (#F5F5F0) for main page backgrounds. Use White (#FFFFFF) for cards/panels.
usage_rules.text: Use Secondary (#1B1B1B) for headings. Use Secondary Light (#2C2C2C) for body text. NEVER use pure black (#000000).
usage_rules.cta: Primary Buttons: Secondary (#1B1B1B) bg + White text. Secondary Buttons: Transparent bg + Secondary border.
usage_rules.highlights: Use Accent (#B89D62) sparingly for borders, active states, or icons.

glassmorphism.usage: Booking widget, Sticky Nav, Floating Cards

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-12, p-24, p-32. Luxury is space.

hero.content: Full-screen image of Chauffeur/Car. Headline: 'Atlanta's Premier Hourly Chauffeur'. CTA: 'Book Your Ride'.
hero.overlay: Gradient from bottom black/50 to transparent for text readability.

booking.left_panel: Booking Form (Wizard style or Long scroll)

about.visual: High-quality portrait of chauffeur (face hidden). Clean typography.

contact.form: Clean inputs, Gold border on focus.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1B1B1B] text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#2C2C2C] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-[#1B1B1B] text-[#1B1B1B] px-8 py-4 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#1B1B1B] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-[#1B1B1B]/20 focus:border-[#B89D62] rounded-none px-0 py-4 outline-none transition-colors placeholder:text-[#1B1B1B]/40

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Booking Form with strict validation (Start Time < End Time, Min 2 Hours).
Use the 'Beige' palette strictly. Do not revert to default gray/white.
Ensure the 'Chauffeur' image is used in the About section to build trust.
Mock the Google Places API with a simple list of Atlanta locations if API key is missing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
